original: Boström, Karl Gunnar, bataljonsläkare, praktiserande läkare, Borås, f. 9/1/07 i Solna av Carl B. o. Anna Jen-sén. G. 34 m. Hjördis Brunius. Barn: Leif f. 35, Kerstin 38, Anna-Lena 44. — Stud:ex. 26, med. kand. 29, med. lic. 34 o. med. dr 39, allt i Sthlm. Stud:resa t. Berlin o. Basel 33. Assist, v. Radiumhemm. svulstpatolog, avd. 30-34, aman. v. dermato-syfilidolog. klin. i Sthlm 34-37, docent i dermato-logi o. syfilidologi v. Karol. inst. 37, andre und :läk. v. S:t Görans sjukh. med. avd. s. å., bat :läk. v. Älvsb. reg. sed. 44, prakt. läk. i Borås. Skr.: ett 20-tal vetiskapl. arb.
translated: Boström, Karl Gunnar, battalion physician, practicing physician, from Borås. Born January 9, 1907 in Solna to Carl B. and Anna Jen-sén. Married in 1934 to Hjördis Brunius. Children: Leif born in 1935, Kerstin born in 1938, Anna-Lena born in 1944. Education: passed the student exam in 1926, medical degree in 1929, licensed to practice medicine in 1934, and awarded the degree of Doctor of Medicine in 1939 - all in Stockholm. Studied in Berlin and Basel in 1933. Assistant at Radiumhemmets tumor pathology department from 1930-1934 and assistant in dermatology and syphilology clinic in Stockholm from 1934-1937. Appointed as a docent in dermatology and syphilology at Karolinska Institute in 1937 and assistant senior physician at S:t Görans Hospital's medical department the same year. Battalion physician for the Älvsborg Regiment from 1944 and practicing physician in Borås. Written works: about 20 scientific papers.
